text:
"Speaking of "vaccine passes" in @Orientering  
Vaccination is no guarantee against #infection and #vaccine passports do not make sense as "stand-alone". 
Perhaps "infection pass" obtained by 
1) negative test / 72 hours 
2) previous #COVID19 
*or* 
3) vaccination"
@c_ianbrandt https://t.co/kBAeeP7F7i
